net.varkhan.base.management.logging
Interface Log<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleLog, StaticLog
public interface Log<T>

A configured log sink.

Return the logging context.

Return the logging key.

getLevel

long getLevel()
Return the logging level mask.

Returns:
the enabled severity level mask for the current context and key

isLevelEnabled

boolean isLevelEnabled(int lev)
Indicate whether a particular logging level is enabled.

Parameters:
lev - a severity level
Returns:
true iff logging for the severity level lev is enabled, for the current context and key

lev - a severity level
msg - the message content
